title: Information Gathering!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Since it’s almost the outing season of Fall, should we go gather some information?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh? Even though it’s still this hot!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It would be too late to start planning after the season is in full swing, right? That’s why we need to get a head start!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Well, what you’re saying makes sense.... But honestly, I don’t have a good feeling about this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>No problem! My suggestions are nothing but good. Anyway, Fall is all about eating good food.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah, that sounds okay....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What food comes to mind when you think about Fall?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Sweet potatoes, chestnuts, and pumpkins also make great sweets. And maybe mushrooms too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yes! But, let’s not forget something, that’s right, saury! Saury in Fall is fatty and is just the best! With that said, Mari would like to go fishing for saury with everyone! Let’s go check out the place in advance~!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Haaah!? What do you mean by fishing for saury!? Check out what place!? W-, wait, stop pulling me~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
